mapper.sql: ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USAGES, MAIN_CLASS, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, JAR_PATH, XML_PATH, PIC_PATH, NUM_EXECUTORS, DRIVER_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_CORES, PARALLELISM, USER_ID, IS_PUBLIC
ALGO, INPUT, OUTPUT, PARAMETERS, PACKAGES, INTERFACES, TEST
mapper.select: select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USAGES, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, PIC_PATH, IS_PUBLIC from tb_paralleltool where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USAGES, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, PIC_PATH, IS_PUBLIC from tb_raster_tool where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USAGES, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, PIC_PATH from tb_paralleltool where IS_PUBLIC = true union select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USAGES, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, PIC_PATH from tb_raster_tool
select ARTIFACT_ID from tb_paralleltool,sys_role_model where tb_paralleltool.ARTIFACT_ID = sys_role_model.MODEL_ID
mapper.insert: insert into tb_paralleltool (ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ALGO, USAGES, MAIN_CLASS, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, DATE, VERSION_ID, KEYWORDS, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, JAR_PATH, XML_PATH, PIC_PATH, NUM_EXECUTORS, DRIVER_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_CORES, PARALLELISM, INPUT, OUTPUT, PARAMETERS, PACKAGES, INTERFACES, TEST, USER_ID, IS_PUBLIC) values (#{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameworkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jarPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numExecutors,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executorMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executorCores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parallelism,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{input,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{out,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{parameters,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{packages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{interfaces,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{test,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPublic,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})

ARTIFACT_ID,
NAME,
DESCRIPTION,

USER_ID,
IS_PUBLIC,

mapper.update:
update tb_paralleltool
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALGO = #{algo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USAGES = #{usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_CLASS = #{mainClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRAMEWORK_TYPE = #{frameworkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_ID = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORDS = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JAR_PATH = #{jarPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XML_PATH = #{xmlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC_PATH = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_EXECUTORS = #{numExecutors,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DRIVER_MEMORY = #{driverMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTOR_MEMORY = #{executorMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTOR_CORES = #{executorCores,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARALLELISM = #{parallelism,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INPUT = #{input,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
OUTPUT = #{out,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PARAMETERS = #{parameters,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PACKAGES = #{packages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
INTERFACES = #{interfaces,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
TEST = #{test,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_paralleltool set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALGO = #{algo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USAGES = #{usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_CLASS = #{mainClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRAMEWORK_TYPE = #{frameworkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_ID = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORDS = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JAR_PATH = #{jarPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XML_PATH = #{xmlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_PATH = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM_EXECUTORS = #{numExecutors,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRIVER_MEMORY = #{driverMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTOR_MEMORY = #{executorMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTOR_CORES = #{executorCores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARALLELISM = #{parallelism,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INPUT = #{input,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OUTPUT = #{out,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PARAMETERS = #{parameters,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PACKAGES = #{packages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, INTERFACES = #{interfaces,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TEST = #{test,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_paralleltool set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALGO = #{algo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USAGES = #{usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_CLASS = #{mainClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRAMEWORK_TYPE = #{frameworkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_ID = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORDS = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JAR_PATH = #{jarPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XML_PATH = #{xmlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_PATH = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM_EXECUTORS = #{numExecutors,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRIVER_MEMORY = #{driverMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTOR_MEMORY = #{executorMemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTOR_CORES = #{executorCores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARALLELISM = #{parallelism,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME, PIC_PATH,DATE,KEYWORDS,
DESCRIPTION,USAGES, MAIN_CLASS, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, VERSION_ID, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, JAR_PATH, XML_PATH, NUM_EXECUTORS, DRIVER_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_CORES, PARALLELISM, USER_ID, IS_PUBLIC
from tb_paralleltool
ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME ,DATE, KEYWORDS, DESCRIPTION,USAGES, MAIN_CLASS, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, VERSION_ID, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, JAR_PATH, XML_PATH, NUM_EXECUTORS, DRIVER_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_CORES, PARALLELISM, USER_ID, IS_PUBLIC from tb_paralleltool where (USER_ID = #{arg0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR IS_PUBLIC = true) and (ARTIFACT_ID like "%${arg1}%" OR NAME like "%${arg1}%")

select ARTIFACT_ID, NAME ,DATE, KEYWORDS, DESCRIPTION,USAGES, MAIN_CLASS, FRAMEWORK_TYPE, VERSION_ID, GROUP_ID, AUTHOR_ID, EMAIL, JAR_PATH, XML_PATH, NUM_EXECUTORS, DRIVER_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_MEMORY, EXECUTOR_CORES, PARALLELISM, USER_ID, IS_PUBLIC from tb_paralleltool where NAME like CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')

select * from tb_paralleltool where
ARTIFACT_ID LIKE #{keyword} OR NAME LIKE #{keyword} OR DESCRIPTION LIKE #{keyword}
